name: Robot Cowboy Insurrection
description:
Hold back a horde of robots in this precision shooter, featuring patented ZOOM™ technology for pinpoint accuracy on your foe's weak point, the lens! Try to get the highest score while holding back a scourge of robots that get faster and more numerous the farther you go!

LMB - Shoot

R - Reload

Created in a week for Qazijam 9.5, by Daeleth, Montblanc, and iyogzzz.

* Play in a 16:9 aspect ratio, some UI elements get cut off otherwise.

If you like looking at a mess, here's some source code - https://github.com/jvandeus/Qazijam9point5
